It serves the cached version (super fast!) and regenerates in the background every ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"30 seconds"}],". Refresh multiple times quickly - the timestamp stays the same. p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto text-sm","children":"// app/demo/isr/page.tsx\n\n// Option 1: Route segment config\nexport const revalidate = 30 // Revalidate every 30 seconds\n\nasync function getData() {\n  const data = await fetch('https://api.example.com/data')\n  return data.json()\n}\n\nexport default async function ISRPage() {\n  const data = await getData()\n  return <div>{data}</div>\n}\n\n// Option 2: Per-request revalidation\nasync function getDataAlt() {\n  const data = await fetch('https://api.example.com/data', {\n    next: { revalidate: 30 } // üëà Revalidate every 30 seconds\n  })\n  return data.json()\n}"}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-green-50 border
